mapper.select: SELECT nf.friendship_id AS friendshipId, CASE WHEN nf.user_no_1 = #{userNo} THEN nf.user_no_2 ELSE nf.user_no_1 END AS userNo, u.user_id AS userId, u.name AS name, u.profile_photo AS profilePhoto, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM neighbor_friends nf JOIN users u ON ( CASE WHEN nf.user_no_1 = #{userNo} THEN nf.user_no_2 ELSE nf.user_no_1 END = u.user_no ) WHERE nf.user_no_1 = #{userNo} OR nf.user_no_2 = #{userNo} ORDER BY nf.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plaza (plaza_no, plaza_name, member_name, user_no) VALUES (#{plazaNo}, #{plazaName}, #{memberName}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT plaza_member_no AS plazaMemberNo, plaza_no AS plazaNo, plaza_name AS plazaName, member_name AS memberName, user_no AS userNo FROM plaza WHERE plaza_no = #{plazaNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT p.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS userName, p.member_name AS memberName, u.profile_photo AS profilePhoto FROM plaza p JOIN users u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.plaza_no = #{plazaNo} ORDER BY CASE p.member_name WHEN '방장' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, p.created_at ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM plaza WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND member_name = '방장'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_location (user_no, latitude, longitude, record_time) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT location_no AS locationNo, user_no AS userNo, latitude, longitude, record_time AS recordTime FROM user_location WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY record_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS name, u.profile_photo AS profilePhoto, ul.latitude AS latitude, ul.longitude AS longitude, ul.record_time AS recordTime FROM plaza p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT latitude, longitude, record_time FROM user_location WHERE user_no = p.user_no AND record_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' ORDER BY record_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ul ON TRUE WHERE p.plaza_no = #{plazaNo} AND ul.latitude IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO safe_zone (zone_type, boundary_coordinates, user_no) VALUES (#{zoneType}, #{boundaryCoordinates}::json, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT safe_zone_no AS safeZoneNo, zone_type AS zoneType, boundary_coordinates AS boundaryCoordinates, user_no AS userNo FROM safe_zone WHERE zone_type = '만남의 광장' AND boundary_coordinates::jsonb @> jsonb_build_object('plazaNo', #{plazaNo}::int) LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM safe_zone WHERE zone_type = '만남의 광장' AND boundary_coordinates::text LIKE '%"plazaNo":' || #{plazaNo} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT p.plaza_no AS plazaNo, p.plaza_name AS plazaName, p.member_name AS memberName, COUNT(DISTINCT p2.user_no) AS memberCount, (p.member_name = '방장') AS isOwner, 0 AS activeMemberCount FROM plaza p LEFT JOIN plaza p2 ON p.plaza_no = p2.plaza_no WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY p.plaza_no, p.plaza_name, p.member_name LIMIT 1

SELECT p.post_id AS noticeNo, p.title AS title, p.content AS content, p.user_no AS authorUserNo, u.name AS authorName, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.view_count AS viewCount FROM post p JOIN users u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.plaza_no = #{plazaNo} AND p.notice_type = '공지' ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, user_no, plaza_no, notice_type) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userNo}, #{plazaNo}, '공지')
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS noticeNo, title, content, user_no AS authorUserNo, created_at AS createdAt, view_count AS viewCount FROM post WHERE post_id = #{noticeNo} AND notice_type = '공지'

SELECT ns.schedule_no AS scheduleNo, ns.schedule_title AS scheduleTitle, ns.content AS content, ns.schedule_date AS scheduleDate, ns.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS authorName, ns.plaza_no AS plazaNo FROM neighbor_schedule ns JOIN users u ON ns.user_no = u.user_no WHERE ns.plaza_no = #{plazaNo} ORDER BY ns.schedule_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO neighbor_schedule (schedule_title, content, schedule_date, user_no, plaza_no) VALUES (#{scheduleTitle}, #{content}, #{scheduleDate}, #{userNo}, #{plazaNo})
mapper.select: SELECT ns.schedule_no AS scheduleNo, ns.schedule_title AS scheduleTitle, ns.content AS content, ns.schedule_date AS scheduleDate, ns.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS authorName, ns.plaza_no AS plazaNo FROM neighbor_schedule ns JOIN users u ON ns.user_no = u.user_no WHERE ns.schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
